Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the imposition of additional rates of sales and compensating use taxes by Erie county
Summary: Relates to the imposition of additional rates of sales and compensating use taxes by Erie county; extends the authorization for such taxes until November 30, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the imposition of additional rates of sales and compensating use taxes by Erie county
